glsa.title: KDE kfile JPEG info plugin: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: The KDE kfile JPEG info plugin of kdegraphics could enter an endless loop leading to a Denial of Service.

background.p: The KDE kfile-info JPEG plugin provides meta-information about JPEG files.

description.p: Marcus Meissner of the SUSE security team discovered a stack overflow vulnerability in the code processing EXIF information in the kfile JPEG info plugin.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to view a specially crafted JPEG image with a KDE application like Konqueror or digiKam, leading to a Denial of Service by an infinite recursion.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
